characteristics.Description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is not Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.
Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

In your Shooting phase, each time this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.

This model must start the battle in Reserves, but it is not counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models.

This model has a transport capacity of 6 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models.

characteristics.Description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of the bearer, but the bearer must halve its Transport Capacity.
This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

Each time this model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit you selected for the Oath of Moment ability, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability and can ignore the penalty to their Hit rolls when making attacks with Indirect Fire weapons against targets that are not visible to them.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
This model’s Punisher rotary cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability when targeting INFANTRY units.
Each time this model makes an attack that targets the closest eligible enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
Each time this model shoots in your Shooting phase, provided it Remained Stationary this turn, all [HEAVY] weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Scorpius multi-launcher scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, re-roll a Damage roll of 1.

This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model must immediately disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models. After this model has been set up on the battlefield, no units can embark within it.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 1 Dreadnought model.

characteristics.Description: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK, WULFEN, PHOBOS, GRAVIS, CENTURION, TERMINATOR, OBLITERATOR, POSSESSED or TACTICUS models (excluding TACTICUS CHARACTER models that began the battle attached to a non-TACTICUS unit).

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.
Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 22 <FACTION> INFANTRY models and 1 DREADNOUGHT model. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, TERMINATOR or POSSESSED model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models.

characteristics.Description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.

Each time this model makes an attack that targets a VEHICLE, improve the Strength and Damage characteristic of that attack by 1 (if that attack targets a FORTIFICATION unit, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead).
Each time this unit shoots its Cerberus neutron pulse array in your Shooting phase, provided it Remained Stationary this turn, that weapon has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 28 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, TERMINATOR or POSSESSED model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models.

characteristics.Description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fellblade model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.
Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its twin Falchion volcano cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 6 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Once per battle round, when an attack is allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 45 <FACTION> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can also transport up to 2 DREADNOUGHT or HELBRUTE models (these models take up the space of a number of models equal to their Wounds characteristic e.g. A DREADNOUGHT with a Wounds characteristic of 8 would take up the space of 8  models).

characteristics.Description: While this model has 1-13 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks
Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 55 <FACTION> Infantry or <FACTION> MOUNTED models. Each JUMP PACK, WULFEN, GRAVIS, POSSESSED or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each MOUNTED, CENTURION or OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can also transport up to 1 RHINO model (this model – and any models embarked within it – take up the space of 25 models).

characteristics.Description: Each time you select this unit for the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ when resolving that Stratagem.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.
This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, POSSESSED and TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models. Each OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can instead transport 1 HELBRUTE or DREADNOUGHT model.

characteristics.Description: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.
Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.
This model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.
While this model has 1-9 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.
While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, its melee weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, once per battle, this model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.
While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 22 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, POSSESSED and TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models. Each OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. This model can instead transport 1 HELBRUTE or DREADNOUGHT model.

characteristics.Description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.
Each time the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

characteristics.Capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 30 <FACTION> INFANTRY or <FACTION> MOUNTED models. Each JUMP PACK, POSSESSED and TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models. Each OBLITERATOR model takes up the space of 3 models. Each MOUNTED model takes up the space of 4 models.
